summary: Started admin panel setup: created .env.local with ADMIN_PASSWORD, ran Prisma migration and generate, started Next.js dev server on port 3000. Server is running in background. User can now access http://localhost:3000/admin/login with password from ADMIN_PASSWORD env var.
current_status: Admin panel server is starting on port 3000. Migration completed. Ready for login at /admin/login. Next: seed products with 'pnpm seed:products' after server is running.
